Name: Fadden
Description:
The Division of Fadden consists of:

  • part of the Gold Coast City Council, and
  • part of the Redland City Council.
ProductsAndIndustry: Residential areas are concentrated in the south with semi-rural in the north. Commercial activities include tourism, market gardens, sugar cane farming, and light industry including boat building.
NameDerivation: Named in honour of Sir Arthur William Fadden, 1895-1973, Prime Minister of Australia (August-October 1941) and a Member of the House of Representatives (1936-58).
Members:
Robert, S (LNQ) 2007-
Jull, D (LP) 1984-2007
Beddall, D P (ALP) 1983-1984
Cameron, D M (LP) 1977-1983
DemographicRating: Outer Metropolitan - situated in capital cities and containing large areas of recent suburban expansion
